resources.string:
National Institute of Technology Patna is the 18th National Institute of Technology created by the Ministry of H.R.D. Government of India after rechristening the erstwhile Bihar College of Engineering Patna on 28. 01. 2004.
NIT Patna marked its humble beginning in 1886 with the establishment of pleaders survey training school which was subsequently promoted of Bihar College of Engineering Patna in 1924.

string-array.name: Highlights

item.b: Congratulations! NIT Patna for securing "92" position in NIRF 2020 Ranking; achieving an improvement of 42 places than NIRF 2019 Ranking
